text:
James O'Heir (born February 4, 1962) is an American actor and Emmy Award winner who is best known for co-starring as Jerry Gergich on the NBC sitcom "Parks and Recreation" from 2009 to 2015.
Career.
He is known for his roles in the movies: "Smothered by Mothers" (2019) and "Seeking a Friend for the End of the World" (2012).

annotations.surface_form: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
